title: Origin Expeditions Website
description: In 2018, I founded Origin Expeditions, a nonprofit dedicated to wilderness education. I authored the entirety of the website's written copy, some of which is previewed below. You can view an archived snapshot of the front page

title: Digital Guides
description: I authored several digital guides for Origin Expeditions to generate organic web traffic to its website. Previews of two of the most successful guides are below, collectively drawing 2,000-4,000 visitors to the website each year.

title: Grant Writingâ€™
description: Our staff at Origin Expeditions engaged in hundreds of hours of fundraising efforts to finance programs for teens. Included is a sample of a grant request I authored that obtained a $5000 award from Founders Brewing Company.
